attributes.action: Add 6 monthly parliamentary review of powers under CoronaVirus Bill HC Bill 122
attributes.background:
The CoronoaVirus Bill should have a parliamentary review of the powers of the government every 6 months added before it is enacted
https://publications.parliament.uk/pa/bills/cbill/58-01/0122/cbill_2019-20210122_en_1.htm?fbclid=IwAR00FM6BG4k0NvPwRERtY4Dwrk8EhhQDVtpssM9UUp0W3-aivca8rxVlYus

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, Parliament introduced 6 month reviews on the operation of the powers.
